title: PGA Stars Seek ‘Some Sort of Unity’ With LIV After Meeting With Tiger Woods
description: Adding to the drama, the LIV golfer Patrick Reed filed a defamation lawsuit against Golf Channel and the commentator Brandel Chamblee, seeking $750 million in damages.
dc:creator: Jesus Jiménez
media:description: Rory McIlroy said Tiger Woods’s leadership at a meeting of PGA Tour golfers was crucial as players discussed how to improve the Tour and contend with the rift in the golf world.
